_header: Walk and have bliss withouten sorrowing

OxfMagd93.Transcription:
Walke and haue bliss withowten sorowyngWalke & haue worschip
                    fletthyngWalke and haue mede withowten endyng
OxfMagd93.Note:
Written as prose; trans. ‘Primo ambulare in
                    via…’, which follows.
